pageTitle: TRX-PRIME.com | USDT to TRX Conversion & TRON Energy Purchase | Fast, Secure, Reliable
desc: Through TRX-PRIME.com, you can access bi-directional conversion services between USDT and TRX, as well as TRX-based energy purchase services to meet resource demands for transactions on the TRON network.
tip: Select 2Ã— if the recipient has no USDT.

faq.question: How safe is it to connect a wallet to the site?
faq.answer: Connecting a wallet only shows your address to the site but does not give permission to spend funds. This is standard practice for dApps.

faq.question: Why should I trust the site?
faq.answer: Our site follows best practices for security and user privacy.

faq.question: Why should I trust the site?
faq.answer: We are open source and community reviewed.

faq.question: Is there KYC?
faq.answer: No KYC is required for using our platform.
